club.issizler.okyanus.api.perms

Interface PermissionService


  • public interface PermissionService
    This service should be implemented by permission plugins to provide player permissions. Do not run multiple permission services in the same server, otherwise undefined behaviour might happen!

    To use this service to check permissions, get an instance by calling Okyanus.getPermissionService() Most methods are aliased in Permissible, so you shouldn't need to get this service manually

    To register a permission service, use Java SPI (https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/sound/SPI-intro.html)
